title: Crash of Light
text:
Crash of Light is a <a href="live%20album">live album</a> by <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> <a href="New%20wave%20music">new wave</a> band <a href="Fra%20Lippo%20Lippi%20%28band%29">Fra Lippo Lippi</a>. It was originally prepared for the band's revived record label <a href="Uniton%20Records">Uniton Records</a>, but was never released in Norway due to legal problems with their distributor. The album was eventually released on LP, CD and cassette in the <a href="Philippines">Philippines</a> by <a href="PolyEast%20Records">OctoArts International</a> in 1990.
This live recording is currently available as part of <a href="Rune%20Grammofon">Rune Arkiv</a>'s re-release of the band's 1985 album "<a href="Songs%20%28Fra%20Lippo%20Lippi%20album%29">Songs</a>".
Personnel.
with
